power.title: Acrid Decay
power.fluff: You extend your hand, and two sickly green bolts spiral out from your fingers, burning and devouring your enemies

section.text: If you target two creatures, you can choose to make one attack as a melee attack and the other as a ranged attack

section.name: Sorcerer-King Pact:
section.text: If you enhance this power with your Fell Might, you get the miss effect even when you target two creatures.

section.name: Target:
section.text: One or two creatures

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d8 + Charisma modifier acid and necrotic damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to damage rolls until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Dark Pact:
section.text: If you have combat advantage against the target, you deal additional damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.

section.name: Vestige Pact:
section.text: The penalty equals your Intelligence modifier.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: If you only targeted one creature, you deal half damage and target takes half of the penalty to damage rolls.

power.title: All the Sand, All the Stars
power.fluff: You make your foe see all the grains of sand in the desert and all the stars in the heavens, and it reels in shock, unable to grasp infinity

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each creature in the blast

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d4 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Star Pact:
section.text: The attack deals additional psychic damage equal to your Intelligence modifier.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: 2 + your Charisma modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus psychic damage, and the target cannot make opportunity attacks until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Confounding Laughter
power.fluff: You create a haunting, maddening laughter about an enemy and the noise drives it mad with frustration, causing it to lash at anyone nearby

section.name: Target:
section.text: One enemy

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You slide the target up to 2 squares. You can finish the attack against the target, even if you slide it outside of the attack's range.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: The target makes a melee basic attack as a free interrupt against an enemy you choose.
After its attack has been resolved, the target takes 2d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, or 3d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage if its attack missed.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: 2 + your Charisma modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus psychic damage.

power.title: Cyst of Darkness
power.fluff: With a whispered incantation, you plant a seed of chilling darkness within your enemy

section.name: Infernal Pact:
section.text: You can choose to replace the cold damage and Cold keyword with fire damage and the Fire keyword.

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3d6 + Charisma modifier cold and necrotic damage.
At the start of your next turn, the target and each creature adjacent to it take cold and necrotic damage equal to your Charisma modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Dark Pact:
section.text: The cold and necrotic damage the target takes at the start of your next turn increases by your Dexterity modifier.

section.name: Star Pact:
section.text: Before the target takes the damage, you can slide it a number of squares equal to 1 + one-half your Intelligence modifier.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and only the target takes takes damage at the start of your next turn.
